headline: Gilead Sciences (GILD) Announces Marketing Authorization for Yeytuo from the European Commission
summary: Gilead Sciences, Inc. (NASDAQ:GILD) is one of the top most undervalued low volatility stocks to buy now. On August 26, Gilead Sciences, Inc. (NASDAQ:GILD) announced that it attained marketing authorization for Yeytuo (lenacapavir) from the European Commission (EC). Yeytuo is the company’s twice-yearly injectable HIV-1 capsid inhibitor that is used as “pre-exposure prophylaxis (PrEP) to […]
